transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom it is the now tenth
day of the eleventh hebrew month sunday
night februari the 9 2014 I just wanted
to share a brief testimony a few days
ago this past Thursday I had to do a
delivery job taking some medical
supplies down to eugene which is about
an hour and a half south here of
portland and as i was returning back
this major snow storm / blizzard hit
oregon and i didn't know if i was going
to be able to make it back to portland
on a typical day it would take about
another hour and a half to get back to
portland on thursday it took me about 13
hours to get back to portland and it
involved a lot of different adventures
of having to get snow chains and having
to take them off again then put them
back on and having to stop several times
i passed a number of car wrecks in fact
there was a 20 mile car pileup a 20-car
pileup that occurred on i five minutes
before i got there yah rescued me from
that yah barely helped me get to a place
and Albany to buy to get chains and to
have them put on my car just before the
roads became completely iced over and
frozen over with with with snow as I was
making my way back my long journey back
to Portland I mean I would see one car
and one truck after another just spun
out across the road even when I got into
portland itself going through i5 there
were several cars that were just stuck
in the snow and stuff but y'all help me
get home and it was a beautiful
prophetic picture because i think that
as we're entering these times where
judgment is going to be falling on this
nation and across the earth where the
time of the son of perdition is fast
approaching that yah it will protect you
well if you have his seal if you have
the seal of his holy spirit he's going
to protect you it's not that he's going
to just whisk you away and take you away
from all the sudden abut just like you
no no it wasn't taken off the earth he
was in
are on the earth as judgment fell and in
psalm 91 it says you know 10,000 will
fall on your right hand and a thousand
on your left but it will not come now
you need to roll it touch you but you
will behold your eyes the judgment of
the wicked and it was like that
snowstorm as I was seeing everyone else
get into these crashes and wrecks and
yeah I just helped me to get get through
all that and protected me safely where I
didn't get one scratch in my car I
didn't have one accident I didn't spin
off through it at all it was like y'all
was showing me that his hand was upon me
and upon all of you who are faithful to
press into him or faithful to obey and
keep his Torah to apply his blood
atonement upon you if you're faithful to
love him with everything in you he will
protect you in these coming times
because things are about to get really
really bad in this country and across
this earth everything's going to change
everything's going to change in these
coming days and weeks because were right
on the verge of the abomination of
desolation and the beginning of the 42
months of the son of perdition and we're
going to need his protection but no
matter what happens around you know that
as long as you're pressing into him and
loving and with everything in you his
hand of protection will be upon you keep
his commandments obey Him love him with
all your heart soul mind and strength
love your neighbors yourself keep the
entire tour of Moses apply his blood
atonement upon you and he will protect
you and read and meditate upon Psalm 91
over and over again press in with
everything in you let him strip away
everything from you that's not of him
and he will take you through he will
protect you hallelujah this is daniel
john lee with tour restoration
ministries the website is ww spirit and
tour com Shalom
